level.description: The Robot Priority Assigner is not working correctly. First, check out the Swap function to figure out what is wrong. Use the new <color=#ffff00ff>PRINTER</color> tool for clues. After using the <color=#ffff00ff>PRINTER</color>, use the BUGCATCHER to catch the bug.
level.introtext: The first bug is in the SWAP function. Can you find it with the <color=#ffff00ff>PRINTER</color> tool?
level.endtext: The SWAP function is fixed! Time to look at the Priority Assigner.
